Posts.Content: From what I'm gathering am i right thinking that radiotherapy is much more effective than hormone treatment? (Bicalutamide +luprolex) my family is still more on trying the hormone treatment for 1 month and then see how it goes and make another decision. My guts is telling me to go ahead with radiotherapy but they're telling me that's he much weaker than when i last saw him 2 yrs ago. I wish it would be easy to know which is the best treatment . Just worried sick at the moment
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy or hormone therapy at age 78

Posts.Content: My uncle was recently diagnosed with prostate cancer Gleason 6 (3+3) 10% of 2 tissue cores out of 7. Psa 32 He is 78 dr suggesting to try hormone therapy for his age. Would this be enough or are we better of doing radiotherapy? We're worried about his age to do radiotherapy but reading about side effects of hormone therapy doesn't look good either. Pls advise
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy or hormone therapy at age 78

Posts.Title: Radiotherapy or hormone therapy at age 78

Posts.Content: Thank u both with your quick response. We're debating between the 2 options and just hard at the moment. He has problem with high blood pressure being maintained by Meds and high cholesterol a little bit under weight, other than that he's still very energetic active in senior citizen but i don't think he exercise regularly. does the radiotherapy affects other organs too this is what my family is most worried about this treatment?
